attributes.action: Increase the budget for school funding
attributes.additional_details:
Since 2010, government school funding has been cut by £12bn, only now the government are trying to reverse them. However, they are only increasing it by £7.1bn. This petition is to show support from the general public to get the £12bn for schools.
References:
https://neu.org.uk/campaigns/funding
https://schoolsweek.co.uk/no-extra-funding-for-schools-next-year-under-spending-pledge/
attributes.background: The budget for schools should be increased. The Government are raising the budget by 7.1 billion by 2022 but that isn't enough; to get sufficient funding for schools the budget must be raised to at least 12 billion.
